授業方法:
The sessions will include a variety of learning activity styles to help students to gain and broaden their understanding of English. Sessions will be conducted using the following learning styles: Lecture, Discussion, Presentation, Pair, and Group work.
The main mode of teaching will be conducted using a lecture approach where students will be expected to take notes and partake in discussion activities related to the session topic. Discussion activities will initially be conducted in pairs or small groups and may then be conducted at a 'class' level.
In sessions 7 and 12 students will partake in a small group (3 or 4 students) presentation on a topic related to themes that have been discussed in-class sessions.

第1回:
Introduction.
I will explain class requirements and course expectations. I will explain the expressions and vocabulary that will be necessary for understanding instructions and how to participate in class. Students will engage in small role-plays to improve confidence in their use of the classroom English as well as a means of interacting with their peers.
